channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brazil Supreme Court panel upholds judge's decision to block X nationwide

item.title: Several people shot outside Ohio high school reunion, investigators say
item.description: Multiple people were shot outside the Shaw High School in East Cleveland, Ohio early on Monday, investigators said.
